text: There had been some confusion, but I'd been able to get information regarding Shinganji Kurenai from Kanzaki Jyubei, the boss of Senzaki and my childhood friend.
Based on that information, Yukikaze and I started our search.

name: Yukikaze
text: So Shinganji Kurenai and Makishima Ayame. They're both from the Fuma Clan, right?

name: Me
text: Right. Kurenai is also my childhood friend, like Jyubei. I don't know much about Ayame-san, but she's more like Kurenai's follower.

name: Yukikaze
text: And? Am I gonna end up fighting these people?
Yukikaze asked without hesitation, but I faltered in answering.

name: Yukikaze
text: Come on and spit it out!

name: Yukikaze
text: I'm your gun, Fuma. I'll protect you even if I'm not told to.

name: Yukikaze
text: But I need to know what I have to protect you from.
Yukikaze's expression was uncharacteristically serious.
She had never shown me such a face.
Or maybe I was the one who was acting different than usual without realizing, so much so that it caused Yukikaze to react this way.

name: Yukikaze
text: Talk, Fuma.

name: Me
text: ...Alright.
"A short time earlierー"
We'd infiltrated a certain city of darkness.

name: Me
text: I made contact with the target just now and handed over the "goods." I'll head back now.

name: Hebiko
text: 『Visual confirmed here as well. What should Heberybody do?』

name: Me
text: It went off without a hitch, so no need for backup anymore. Go ahead back to the inn.

name: Hebiko
text: 『Understood. Fuma-chan, be careful on the way back.』

name: Me
text: Roger that. Fuma out.
I ended communication with Hebiko and started moving to return to the safehouse while keeping watch for any tails.
From the back street I entered a back alley, and then walked toward an abandoned building.
And right after I entered the building,
a lone woman entered it as well.
I was being followed.

name: Me
text: You need something from me?
Using some blind spots in the abandoned building, I snuck around to take her from behind, then called out to her.
The woman who had apparently been following me showed no surprise at all from this and slowly turned to face me.

name: Mine Funako
text: Nice to meet you. I'm Mine Funako. You're Fuma Kotaro-kun, right?

name: Me
text: Sakura, standby. Seems like she isn't our enemy.

name: Funako
text: Sakura?

name: Me
text: It doesn't matter... Um, I'll give this back to you.
I returned the ID that I'd stolen from her.
On it was clearly printed "Mine Funako," "Cabinet Intelligence and Research Office," and "Director."
In other words, the woman before me was a high-ranking government official.

name: Funako
text: What a surprise. As I should expect from the captain of the famous Independent Commando Unit.
The woman gave me a wide-eyed look, but I hadn't done anything.
Since I'd realized that I was being followed, I had Sakura, who was lurking in the shadows for her part-time job as usual, simply steal her ID to check her identity.

name: Me
text: Drop the act, please. You purposely let me notice and steal your ID to get me to trust you, right?

name: Funako
text: If that were the case, how did you figure out that I wasn't your enemy?

name: Me
text: I at least know who the leader of your Cabinet is, as well as her face. I happened to have a chance to do a lot of research on it.

name: Funako
text: Right. Down to business then. I want to talk to you, privately.

name: Me
text: Understood. Sakura, give us a moment.

name: Sakura
text: Is everything okay?
Sakura asked as she popped out of my shadow.

name: Me
text: Maybe.

name: Sakura
text: I'll stay somewhere nearby, so if anything happens, call me!
With that said, she slipped into one of the other shadows in the area.
A person had suddenly emerged from a literal shadow, and then disappeared into one again.
This should have been much more surprising than having her ID stolen, but Funako was calm and composed.

name: Me
text: What do you want to talk to me about?

name: Funako
text: I'm currently investigating an assassination case, one of a certain man.

name: Funako
text: Sago Bungo. You know him, don't you?

name: Me
text: So that's why you made contact with me.
She was from the Cabinet after all.
I was sure that she had already researched about me being involved in Sago's escort.

name: Funako
text: At that time, the plan was for us at the Cabinet to keep Sago.
It lined up with the results of the investigation which I had done by myself afterward.
That Gosha Village had been trying to hand Sago over to the Cabinet Intelligence and Research Office.
For this very reason I'd known the name and face of its director, the highest ranking person in the Cabinet.

name: Me
text: So who does the Cabinet think is the mastermind behind that assassination?

name: Funako
text: The UFS secret service agency "G," the one that was interfering with you.

name: Me
text: That's the obvious choice.
Mine Funako simply nodded at my sarcastic remark.

name: Funako
text: Yes. Too obvious. But, what if it was wrong?

name: Funako
text: I suspect Igawa Asagi.

name: Me
text: Headmistress Asagi!? There's no way it's her!!!
I replied reflexively.
But it wasn't because her words were unexpected.
If anything, it was certainly a possibility I had thought of.
Igawa Asagi could have had Sago Bungo killed.

name: Funako
text: Can you really trust that Asagi is innocent?

name: Funako
text: Many people hold a deep grudge against Sago as the principal perpetrator of the Fuma rebellion.

name: Funako
text: What if she thought about eliminating him before he was brought into Cabinet custody?

name: Me
text: But that's...! That can't be...
Mine Funako showered me with questions.
I tried to refute her, but my words stuck in my throat.
My feelings notwithstanding, I couldn't logically deny it.

name: Funako
text: Right? An irrefutable deduction, isn't it? So we have a request for you. We want you to investigate who ordered Sago's assassination.

name: Funako
text: You'll have peace of mind as well if you can confirm that Asagi is not the mastermind, no?

name: Yukikaze
text: Are you saying that Asagi-sensei assassinated this Sago guy!? Using Shinganji Kurenai and Makishima Ayame!?

name: Me
text: I don't know.

name: Yukikaze
text: What do you mean you don't know!? There's no way she'd do something like that!!
In response to Yukikaze's angry shouts, a few neon lights in the back alley exploded.
That was why I hadn't explained the details before arriving in Senzaki.

name: Me
text: But Makishima Ayame is an expert sniper, so we can't deny that possibility.

name: Yukikaze
text: But that doesn't...!!
*Boom! Bah-boom!!*

name: Me
text: Calm down a bit. And control your electricity, too. We're standing out too much.

name: Yukikaze
text: *Hufffff*ー
Yukikaze let out a long exaggerated exhale from her nose before she spoke again, seemingly trying to get her emotions under control.

name: Yukikaze
text: If it's true that Headmistress Asagi assassinated Sago, then the situation is serious.

name: Yukikaze
text: Shinganji Kurenai and Makishima Ayame, they might end up fighting against Gosha.
I knew what would happen without her telling me.
As I fell into silence, Yukikaze peered into my face with a concerned look in her eyes.

name: Yukikaze
text: Well, now I understand why you kept Hebiko and Shikanosuke out of this.

name: Yukikaze
text: But they'll be angry, you know? They'll tell you that you should've called them because it's a serious mission.

name: Me
text: No, it just wasn't a smart move to draw attention with a large group for this one.

name: Me
text: So, I thought I should bring only the most skilled Taimanin that I knew on this mission.

name: Yukikaze
text: So that's why you brought me?

name: Me
text: I couldn't think of anyone else.

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmph! Now you're talking! Not a bad decision for you, Fuma.

name: Yukikaze
text: Like I said, Fuma, I'm your gun. Whenever you need me. Don't you forget it!
Yukikaze finally showed her usual reliable faceーno, it looked even more reliable than usual.
A nightclub in a back street.
That was our destination.
According to Jyubei, the real owner of this nightclub, who controlled it from the shadows, was the Shinganji family.
I put Yukikaze on standby, then went in alone first as a customer.

name: Me
text: Call Kurenai.
When I said her name to the men serving in black attire, their expressions all completely changed.
I was taken to a back door by shady men who suddenly appeared.

name: Me
text: (Well, so far exactly as planned...)
Ten of the nightclub's bodyguards surrounded me.

name: Demon Mercenary
text: Who are you, kiddo?

name: Me
text: Tell her that Kotaro is here, she'll understand. Just call Kurenai.

name: High Orc
text: Yeah? And we're sayin' there ain't no woman named Kurenai in this place!!

name: Me
text: I know she's here. Just tell her it's Kotaro.

name: Demon Mercenary
text: Stop screwing around, ya bastard!
Talk about being turned away at the gates.
I was kind of expecting this to happen though.

name: Yukikaze
text: 『Hey. Need my help?』
The transmission came in from Yukikaze through the communication device I secretly had in my ear.

name: Me
text: No, stay on standby. I'm waiting for something.

name: Yukikaze
text: 『Are you sure?』

name: Me
text: I'm sure. Let me take care of this.

name: Demon Mercenary
text: Hey!! What're you mumbling about, you bastard!?

name: High Orc
text: You're pretty suspicious. How about we bust you up a little, kiddo?
I could feel the threatening gazes of the bodyguards all fall upon me.

name: Me
text: (Sheesh, I guess this is to be expected too huh...)
